summary: T EXHIBIT: ‘I thought about all I'd read and said to myself, either quit. or smoke.’ T EXCLUSIVE: I thought I was going to die, but I'm still alive. TEXTS:   ‘Either quit, or I'll die. ’ “I'm not sure what to do,” I said.
